overview: Jas, a Hindu boy, belongs to a very rich family and has a good Muslim friend named Javed, who comes from a poor family. Jas loves and respects Javed as if he were God incarnate. Javed is a small-time poet, but Jas encourages him by getting his book published and even allowing him to stay at his house. But soon, their friendship will face its ultimate test.
title: Mulaqaat
